definition: to see with one's own eyes/very soon
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to believe what one sees, not what one hears (idiom). Don't believe what people tell you until you see if for yourself./It ain't necessarily so.
pinyin: yan3 jian4 wei2 shi2 , er3 ting1 wei2 xu1

definition: Take what you hear to be false, only believe it when you see it (idiom). Don't believe what people tell you until you see if for yourself./It ain't necessarily so.
pinyin: er3 ting1 wei2 xu1 , yan3 jian4 wei2 shi2

sentences.english: I'll believe it when Isee it.
sentences.chinese: 我要亲眼见到才能相信。

sentences.english: Chen Tianfang see the situation is critical, led by the Cang wolf commandos launched rescue operations.
sentences.chinese: 陈天放眼见形势危急，率领苍狼突击队展开营救行动。

sentences.english: Supply authentic, but seeing is believing, welcomed the inspection.
sentences.chinese: 房源真实可信，不过眼见为实，欢迎验看。

sentences.english: And I have seen the eternal Footman hold my coat, and snicker.
sentences.chinese: 我曾眼见永恒的守门人接过我的大衣，然后窃笑。

sentences.english: Curious to see the changes for myself, I visited Shenyang last month.
sentences.chinese: 怀着眼见为实的好奇心，我上个月参观了沈阳。

sentences.english: We stay out, and watch genocide engulf Rwanda.
sentences.chinese: 我们洁身自好，却眼见种族灭绝吞没卢旺达。

sentences.english: However, seeing is believing, and we've yet to get a glimpse.
sentences.chinese: 然而，眼见为实，我们至今还没有看过他们一起打球。

sentences.english: Seeing is believing. And then disbelieving. And maybe believing once more.
sentences.chinese: 眼见为实，后引起怀疑，或许最后又再次相信。

sentences.english: She saw a strange bird with her own eyes.
Ears, seeing is believing, we conducted on-the-spot visit.
sentences.chinese: 耳听为虚，眼见为实，我们进行了实地参观。

sentences.english: This article is to introduce the stylistic features and functions of the Hard-Sell advertisement.
sentences.chinese: “硬卖”广告是人们每天眼见耳闻的一种广告。

sentences.english: See a steady stream of guests who consistently become members.
sentences.chinese: 眼见源源不断的来宾终于成为会员。

sentences.english: Just as in his illustrations, seeing is believing.
sentences.chinese: 就好像他的插画，眼见为实。

sentences.english: But despite some similarities, looks can be deceiving.
sentences.chinese: 尽管确实有些相似之处，但眼见的也可能是假象。

sentences.english: I didn’tget to see it really happening but I saw him dead.
sentences.chinese: 我并无亲眼见到，但我知道西西拉的确死了。

sentences.english: We can watch them at work.
sentences.chinese: 我们能亲眼见到他们工作。

definition: soon/in a moment/to look on as sth happens
to do something to sb/to deal with/to cope/how?/to no avail
in a flash/in the blink of an eye/to glance
to adopt an attitude/to strike a posture
unable to change sth/unable to deal with
